name: LayoutSection

fields.name: customLabel
fields.description: Indicates if this section's label is custom or standard (built-in).

fields.name: detailHeading
fields.description: Controls if this section appears in the detail page.

fields.name: editHeading
fields.description: Controls if this section appears in the edit page.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The label; either standard or custom, based on the customLabel property.

fields.name: layoutColumns
fields.description: Lists the layout columns. You can have one, two, or three columns, ordered left to right, are possible.

fields.name: style
fields.description: The style of the layout for this section.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.LayoutSection.

description: Represents a section of a page layout, such as the Custom Links
